Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Opponent
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Player class to keep player information and deal with user input
Version:
May 27, 2021
Author:
Oliver

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Player()
    Creates a default player with piece “x”

    Creates a player with piece “ch”
